markdown.markdown: I am **Boyi Chen**, a Statistics major at **UCLA**, with strong interests in **data science, risk management, and artificial intelligence**. My academic background combines **statistical modeling, data analysis, and experimental design**, equipping me with the tools to explore complex data-driven problems. - **University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)** - Major: **Statistics** - Expected Graduation: **07/2025** - Relevant Coursework: Probability, Experimental Design, Monte Carlo Methods, Data Mining ## **Research Interests** I am particularly interested in: - **Risk Management & Financial Modeling** My internship experience in **risk management** has given me exposure to practical applications of statistics in finance and decision-making. - **Artificial Intelligence & Statistical Learning** I am exploring graduate programs focusing on **AI, machine learning, and statistics** to further develop my expertise. - **Experimental Design & Human Behavior Analysis** I have worked on **factorial experiments**, such as analyzing how morning exercise and coffee impact **problem-solving ability**. ## **Experience** - **Risk Management Internship** – Applied statistical modeling techniques to analyze financial risks. - **Academic Research** – Investigated the impact of **reading medium (paper vs. screen) on comprehension** using statistical methods. ## **Technical Skills** - **Programming:** R, Stata, Python - **Data Analysis & Visualization:** R Studio, Stata, ggplot2, pandas - **Machine Learning & Statistical Methods:** Regression, Monte Carlo, Factorial Design ## **Future Goals** I am preparing for **graduate studies** in **AI, Statistics, or Risk Management**, and I aim to apply advanced statistical methods to solve real-world problems. ## **Contact** - Email: **joecby@gmail.com** - GitHub: [https://github.com/Deltazzz](https://github.com/Deltazzz) - LinkedIn: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/joe-chen-787561275/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joe-chen-787561275/) - [Download My CV](files/BoyiChen_CV.pdf)
